adrFormatAddress: 304 W 88th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Coach Mike is amazing! He has been coaching my son who is now 4 since he was 3. He is such a great coach especially for these little ones that really don’t have long attention spans. He teaches them teamwork, how to never give up and also to have fun while teaching them important lessons weekly. My son loves Coach Mike and looks forward to his basketball class every week!

He teaches them teamwork, how to never give up and also to have fun while teaching them important lessons weekly. My son loves Coach Mike and looks forward to his basketball class every week!

originalText.text: Coach Mike is wonderful!  He makes basketball skills accessible even to the youngest kids.  Our kids were so excited to see Coach Mike every week and learned real basketball skills that were taught in a fun, age appropriate manor.  Kids went home every week looking forward to the following class.  If you're little one is interested in basketball, Hands on Hoops is the place to call.

originalText.text: We absolutely loved our experience with Hands On Hoops. To say they were the best is an understatement. Coach Mike and his team were so good at teaching young kids all the necessary skills, at the same time keeping it so fun and entertaining. My 3 year old son had a blast burning off energy and making new friends, all the while building confidence in himself and learning about teamwork. Coach Mike was a joy to communicate with and watching him with the kids make it clear how much he loves what he does. We will absolutely be back.

text.text: We absolutely loved our experience with Hands On Hoops. To say they were the best is an understatement. Coach Mike and his team were so good at teaching young kids all the necessary skills, at the same time keeping it so fun and entertaining. My 3 year old son had a blast burning off energy and making new friends, all the while building confidence in himself and learning about teamwork. Coach Mike was a joy to communicate with and watching him with the kids make it clear how much he loves what he does. We will absolutely be back.

originalText.text: Hands on hoops is an amazing program! Our kiddo plays in a pod with about 10 other 4 year olds. Mike and his team are super passionate about teaching basketball. They do a great job of bringing the group together but also in paying attention to cues from each child and meeting them where they're at to teach them skills in a way that works for each child. Not only are kids learning skills for the game, they are gaining confidence and teamwork skills important for on and off the court

originalText.text: Took my shy 7 year old to Coach Mike for a one on one lesson. I was worried that he would be nervous learning something new. Fortunately for us Coach Mike was an absolute pro. His style of teaching and running drills kept my son engaged and having fun the entire session. He makes basketball very accessible to young/ new students and teaches in a way that is really effective
